name: CITY
description: Stonk City ($CITY) is a meme-powered game where investing meets risk-taking on the blockchain. Players can stake $CITY for steady yield or gamble it on high-return stocks — but every token used to buy stocks gets burned, forever reducing supply. This introduces a strategic deflationary loop fueled by user choices. The project transforms “stonks” culture into an interactive ecosystem where community participation shapes supply, rewards, and future features. In Stonk City, every decision matters — do you play it safe or go all in?
